channel.title: Dots per Inch on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Dots per Inch on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Dots Vs. Pixels
item.description: Today in Tedium: If you stare into the heart of your smartphone for a while, you may start to make out the pixels. If your smartphone is really old, like the original iPhone or a cheap Android phone, that might not take a while, because the pixel resolution is quite low. But if you have an iPhone X, with its 458ppi (pixels per inch) OLED screen, perhaps it might not be so easy.
